Question: This person also presided over the expansion of the federal government's economic influence in several other areas.
Hints: From 1853 to 1860, another of this person's largest clients was the Illinois Central Railroad.
On March 4, 1865, this person delivered his second inaugural address.
In 1861, this person signed the second and third Morrill Tariff, the first having become law under James Buchanan.
